page.title: 16SHINFIELD-PAST & PRESENT (2)
page.content:
SHINFIELD HAS VARIOUS GROUPS AND CLUBS.THE FOLLOWING ARE SOME OF THESE:
THE CUBS AND SCOUTS WERE FORMED ABOUT 30 YEARS AGO AND OFTEN RUN JUMBLE SALES AND BAZAARS.THE GROUP MEETS EVERY THURSDAY AND FRIDAY AND HAS AN OPEN DAY IN JULY. SHINFIELD HISTORY SOCIETY HAS BEEN ESTABLISHED SINCE JAN.1982.IT SOMETIMES HOLDS EXHIBITIONS AND MEETS AT ST.MARY'S CHURCH ONCE A MONTH. THE POUND GREEN WOMENS' INSTITUTE HAVE MEETINGS,WITH VISITING SPEAKERS, ONCE A MONTH AT THE VILLAGE HALL AND HAVE BEEN FORMED SINCE 1972. THE SHINFIELD FOLK DANCERS WERE FORMED 60 YEARS AGO.THEY MEET EVERY TUESDAY,AGAIN IN THE PARISH HALL. UNFORTUNATELY,THEY HAVE NO SPECIAL EVENTS BUT SOMETIMES JOIN UP WITH OTHER FOLK DANCE CLUBS.
